attributes.action: GCSE exams should not be in Ramadhan!
attributes.background: having GCSEs in Ramadhan makes it extremely difficult for students who fast to achieve best possible grades as they will be tired,sleepy, not have enough energy, not  eaten breakfast, staying awake etc!!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise.The Joint Council for Qualifications (JCQ) is responsible for deciding exam periods, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

The JCQ is made up of representatives from different exam boards and is independent from Government and Parliament. You can find out more about the JCQ here: 

https://www.jcq.org.uk/about-us

You may wish to contact the JCQ directly about this issue. You can find out how to contact them here: 

https://www.jcq.org.uk/contact-us/contact-details-for-jcq-and-members
